title: Transactions at Pret A Manger
summary: The number of transactions at Pret A Manger stores relative to January 2020
description: Pret A Manger is a sandwich and coffee shop franchise chain, operating around 400 stores across the UK. Its transactional data are presented as an index and show total weekly till transactions at Pret A Manger shops as a proportion of the average weekly level in the first four weeks of 2020 (between Friday 3 January and Thursday 30 January 2020). Because of this comparison across the data time series, users should expect an element of seasonality in the data.

measure.label: indexed sales
measure.description: indexed weekly sales indexed ((Friday 3 January and Thursday 30 January 2020)/4=100)
